boldfaced adjective [before noun]
(THICK AND DARK)
Add to word list
Add to word list
printed in a dark, thick style: The statement was in boldfaced italics. Can we pull all the bold faced items out and make a list? You can use <b> tags to make the text boldfaced. Synonyms
bold
boldface a boldfaced name
a person whose name is very well known to the public: She was a boldfaced name in newspaper gossip columns.

boldfaced adjective [before noun]
(NO SHAME)
showing no shame or embarrassment about doing something bad: They found boldfaced lies on his resume. I can deal with losing, but not because of bold faced dishonesty on my opponent's part. Synonyms

boldface
